name: BOK-BOK: Hen Tie Club Demo
description:
Wishlist the full version on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1953630/BOKBOK_Hen_Tie_Club/

*WARNING, THIS GAME IS INCREDIBLY DIFFICULT*

Take the role of Henry Cock once more as you climb the towers to retrieve the sacred tie that grants entry into the exclusive Hen-Tie club!

Using a simple 2 button control system, this unique 3-flap platformer will have you on the edge of your seat!

Features:
- One large level consisting of 6 stages
- Checkpoints (Because we're not that evil)
- Built-in speedrun timer
- A whole heap of pain and suffering
